name: MIDSHIP 25
notes:
Offered under a number of different names from a number of different builders. Approximately 200 were built as the MIDSHIP 25 until 1974. (Midship Yacht Co. was located in Las Vegas NV.) 
After production was moved to Florida the boat was renamed DAWSON 25. At least another 100 of these were built. Since then the tooling changed ownership a number of times and boats have been sold under a number of other names including the PARKER-DAWSON 26, NAUSET 26, BOMBAY 26. 
It is doubtful that any new boats have been built since the mid 1980's.
A fixed keel version was also available. 
Wheel steering, a ketch rig, and various auxilary inboard engines were offered as options.
